answer: When using a regular taxi make sure it's with a reputable company or you agree upon the rate upfront. In a lot of countries taxis will take every opportunity to rip off tourists. You'll generally not have this problem with private car services. Private car services are also generally more comfortable and easier to have little stops or detours along the way.

question.subtitle: When planning a trip I've seen people say private cars are scams and other people say they can be better than city taxi's because you know how much it will cost ahead of time. Are there any other advantages that a private car may have over a city taxi? Are there any other disadvantages other than the cost? Do city taxis have hidden costs that a traveler should be aware of such as running the meter while waiting for a rider ?
